mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.orgs AS "orgs", a.contractor AS "contractor", a.sponsors AS "sponsors", a.des AS "des", a.starttime AS "starttime", a.endtime AS "endtime", a.regstarttime AS "regstarttime", a.regendtime AS "regendtime", a.createtime AS "createtime", a.updatetime AS "updatetime", a.address AS "address", a.detailAddress AS "detailAddress", a.contacts AS "contacts", a.phone AS "phone", a.state AS "state", a.type AS "type", a.lat AS "lat", a.lng AS "lng", a.counts AS "counts"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bisai_match( id, name, orgs, contractor, sponsors, des, starttime, endtime, regstarttime, regendtime, createtime, updatetime, address, detailAddress, contacts, phone, state, type, lat, lng, counts ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{orgs}, #{contractor}, #{sponsors}, #{des}, #{starttime}, #{endtime}, #{regstarttime}, #{regendtime}, #{createtime}, #{updatetime}, #{address}, #{detailAddress}, #{contacts}, #{phone}, #{state}, #{type}, #{lat}, #{lng}, #{counts} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bisai_match SET name = #{name}, orgs = #{orgs}, contractor = #{contractor}, sponsors = #{sponsors}, des = #{des}, starttime = #{starttime}, endtime = #{endtime}, regstarttime = #{regstarttime}, regendtime = #{regendtime}, createtime = #{createtime}, updatetime = #{updatetime}, address = #{address}, detailAddress = #{detailAddress}, contacts = #{contacts}, phone = #{phone}, state = #{state}, type = #{type}, lat = #{lat}, lng = #{lng}, counts = #{counts} WHERE id = #{id}
